text: 24.24: Lo 13.1-3; Mk 13.22; 2 Te 2.8-9; VB 13.13-14Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, gumgi thari, mbe zɨv guiguigɨv khaŋ suanga, ‘Gu Fhe Bakɨme taagip wo gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav suaŋgiap farasarigi guma ma,’ o ‘Gu Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ guma ma.’ Mbe maaŋ suaŋv, mbe mbarkɨrga mirikori, mbe ntan muunga, mbe mbarkɨrga bigi, mbe ntan muunga. Mbe mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe mbe ndɨkndɨgi ŋgɨrga. Mbe maaŋ muuŋv, mbe tuktɨgɨrga, mbe vhɨra mba Fhe Bakɨme farasegi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe vhɨra mbe ndɨkndɨgi ŋgɨrga.
